adjective.description: Designating the layer of connective tissue located beneath a mucous membrane.
Located or occurring in the submucosa; = "submucosal".

origin: Late 17th century (in an earlier sense). From sub- + mucous. In sense 1 after post-classical Latin submucosus from classical Latin sub- + mūcōsus, apparently after ancient Greek ὑπόμυξος.
